name: Teyolia
description:
Teyolia is a bullet hell dungeon crawler game where you navigate trough an ancient aztec pyramid to try and reach the top to kill the evil god that is corrupting the land

Controls

W, A, S, D - Move
Mouse - Aim
Esc - Open Main Menu

Credits

Schroder Chris - Programming
cosmo2401 - Programming
Rocketeclair - Audio/Programming
Yves - 2D Sprites
radioactive_garlic - 2D Sprites
